Sentencas: Energy and exergy assessments are reported of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC), for steady-state operation and using a zero-dimensional approach.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The trigeneration system also includes a generator-absorber heat exchanger for cooling and a heat exchanger for the heating process.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The influences of two significant SOFC parameters (current density and inlet flow temperature) on several variables are investigated.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The results show that the energy efficiency is a minimum of 33% higher when using the trigeneration system compared with the SOFC power cycle.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the maximum energy efficiencies are found to be 79% for the trigeneration system, 69% for the heating cogeneration, 58% for cooling cogeneration and 46% for electricity production.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Moreover, the highest trigeneration exergy efficiency is almost 47% under the given conditions.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: It is also shown that, as SOFC current density increases, the exergy efficiencies decrease for the power cycle, cooling cogeneration, heating cogeneration and trigeneration.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: As current density increases, the trigeneration energy and exergy efficiencies decrease, and an optimal current density is observed to exist at which the net electrical power is a maximum.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: As SOFC inlet flow temperature increases, the trigeneration energy and exergy efficiencies and net electrical power increase to a peak and then decrease.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The main exergy destructions occur in the air heat exchanger, the SOFC and the afterburner.
Titulo: Energy and exergy assessments of a novel trigeneration system based on a solid oxide fuel cell
